thread.title: So, Dumbledore Showed Up at the Democratic Presidential Debate and the Internet Is Obsessed
thread.title_full: So, Dumbledore Showed Up at the Democratic Presidential Debate and the Internet Is Obsessed

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: So, Dumbledore Showed Up at the Democratic Presidential Debate and the Internet Is Obsessed
text:
â€‹Buzzfeed reports a wizard showed up in the audience during Tuesday's Democratic presidential debate. He brought real magic with him, the kind that exists on Twitter when people become utterly fascinated by completely random things that have nothing whatsoever do with the topic at hand.
During the Republican debates, the Internet was more fixated on finding out who this hot guy was than worrying about the next crazy thing coming out of Donald Trump's mouth. Tuesday night, it was the Democrats turn to be ignored in favor of something cool in the audience. The bearded man was spotted in the audience by a few people who were probably also sick and tired of hearing about damn emails . They had many questions about the mysterious man.
 Who's the wizard at the democratic presidential debate? #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/ydkeKAmEmQ
â€” Leo Boulton (@leoboulton) October 14, 2015
 Wizard in audience. I repeat. Wizard in audience. #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/R660FlOAMB
â€” Steve King (@steveking_) October 14, 2015
Why is there a wizard at the democratic debateðŸ˜‚
â€” Nick (@NickkPicard) October 14, 2015
How did a wizard time travel to the debate???!!
â€” JanvierNoir (@JanvierNoir) October 14, 2015
who else saw the wizard in the crowd at the democratic national convention?
â€” Grant Lemons (@GrantLemons) October 14, 2015
Immediately, people began to make their best most scientifically accurate guesses as to who this man was.
Apparently Santa doesn't approve of Hillary trying to raise minimum wage for the Elves #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/jgopeG4s8G
â€” Jack Mendelsohn (@JackMendelsohn) October 14, 2015
